Laurens van der Maaten

Assistant Professor in machine learning and computer vision.

Email Facebook Google+ Github

Laurens van der Maaten

I am an Assistant Professor at Delft University of Technology working on machine learning and computer vision. Before, I was a post-doc at UC San Diego and a Ph.D. student at Tilburg University. In February 2015, I will join Facebook AI Research as a research scientist.

My website on t-SNE is here. My Matlab Toolbox for Dimensionality Reduction is here. For more of my software, please have a look here.
